author: Ashley Collman
title: The US is investigating the theory that COVID-19 was accidentally released from a Chinese lab
description: The US is exploring the possibility that COVID-19 was accidentally released from a Chinese lab, intelligence sources told Yahoo News, Fox News, and CNN. President Trump and Secretary of State Mike Pompeo made statements recently confirming that the government…
content:
The US government is exploring the possibility that COVID-19 was accidentally released from a Chinese lab, sources told Yahoo News, Fox News, and CNN.
The outbreak started in Wuhan, China, home to some of the country's top research laboratories. One of them … [+3689 chars]
